      • chunkDataSendCounter

        public int chunkDataSendCounter
        Counter used to prevent us from sending too many chunk data packets one after another. The delay appears to be set to 50.

        public void networkShutdown​(java.lang.String par1Str,
                            java.lang.Object... par2ArrayOfObj)
        Shuts down the network with the specified reason. Closes all streams and sockets, spawns NetworkMasterThread to stop reading and writing threads.
